endpoints.description: Add a new personal care product along with initial ingredient list metadata.
Retrieve detailed information and compliance status for a specific product by ID.
Update product details including ingredient composition for an existing product.
Remove a product and its associated compliance records from the system.
Verify and confirm compliance of an ingredient list against the specified international standards.
Fetch a database of standard ingredients along with their regulatory information.
Register for notifications regarding changes in regulations related to specified ingredients.
Generate a structured report indicating the compliance status of all managed products.
Modify user-specific application preferences including default regulatory standards.
Access a record of all past operations performed in the service platform for monitoring and auditing.
